description: A deliciously curried sauce brings the flavour of these clams to life.
name: Curry Clams Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and scrub the clams. Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat and then add the canola oil.
Pound the lemongrass with back edge of a knife. Add to pan with onions and fry for 3 minutes.
Add the clams to the pot while tossing, cook for a further 5 minutes or until the clams start to open.
Once the clams are open, add the rest of the ingredients to the pan apart from the scallion and lemon.
Bring the dish to the boil and then simmer while stirring for 6 minutes so the sauce starts to reduce.
Remove from the heat and serve garnished with scallions and lemon.
